revised_title: Observations on the Coagulation of Silver Particles in Aqua Fortis
tldr: The author, Anthony van Leeuwenhoek, observed and described the coagulation of silver particles in Aqua Fortis under a microscope. He discovered that the particles formed hexagonal, diamond-like shapes, which he believed to be the same form before they were visible to the naked eye. This research contributed to the understanding of crystallography and microscopy.
